p: Lippia alba (34.48%) and Lippia origanoides (20.69%) were the most studied species of the Lippia genus, whereas Lantana camara (53.33%) and Lantana montevidensis (26.67%) were the most studied of the Lantana genus. Concerning the Aloysia genus, the most studied species were Aloysia triphylla (33.33%), Aloysia polystachya (22.22%), and Aloysia gratissima (22.22%).
